comment.text: So, Hillary wants kids to succeed, and Trump doesn't? SMFH. Billary's campaign is imploding and I'm loving it. More popcorn please...

replies.text: Jessie How come you're not getting any "likes"??? It's quite clear you too are losing massive support with your brain-dead, copy & paste response. Getting lonely??? You can visit her in Prison....don't worry.
